snippet: The Marlins slugger Mike Stanton deciding go by his given name of Giancarlo brings back memories of other athletes who changed their names mid-career. Can you name some others or suggest some changes for current athletes?
abstract: The Marlins slugger Mike Stanton deciding go by his given name of Giancarlo brings back memories of other athletes who changed their names mid-career. Can you name some others or suggest some changes for current athletes?
